question: What is the name of ISRO’s Space Situational Awareness (SSA) centre?
explanation:
The Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO) has set up a dedicated control centre for Space Situational Awareness (SSA). 
It has been named as Netra” and is aimed at monitoring, tracking and protecting India’s space assets. It is set up at ISTRAC campus at Peenya, Bangalore.
